T1204.002::[IndigoZebra] sent spearphishing emails containing malicious attachments that urged recipients to review modifications in the file which would trigger the attack.
T1566.001::[IndigoZebra] sent spearphishing emails containing malicious password-protected RAR attachments.
T1583.001::[IndigoZebra] has established domains, some of which were designed to look like official government domains, for their operations.
T1583.006::[IndigoZebra] created Dropbox accounts for their operations.
T1586.002::[IndigoZebra] has compromised legitimate email accounts to use in their spearphishing operations.
T1588.002::[IndigoZebra] has acquired open source tools such as [NBTscan] and Meterpreter for their operations.
